member.name: T:SystemAdmin.Plugin.SystemAdminSettings
member.summary: Contains settings and configuration data for displaying items within the SystemAdmin.Plugin module.

member.name: P:SystemAdmin.Plugin.SystemAdminSettings.GoogleMapApiKey
member.summary:
Google maps api key, should map data be viewed.
Must be between 15 and 80 characters long.

member.name: P:SystemAdmin.Plugin.SystemAdminSettings.ShowAppSettingsJson
member.summary:
Determines whether appsettings.json file can be viewed or not
Default value: false.
member.value: bool. If true the appsettings.json file can be viewed, this could potentially be a security vulnerability depending on what data is stored in there.

member.name: P:SystemAdmin.Plugin.SystemAdminSettings.DisableFormattedText
member.value: bool. If true the formatted text is disabled.

member.name: T:SystemAdmin.Plugin.SystemAdminHelper
member.summary: This class acts as a wrapper around the elements you extend through plugin manager

member.name: T:SystemAdmin.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin and IPluginVersion which allows the SystemAdmin.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module

member.name: M:SystemAdmin.Plugin.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary:
This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to add services to the container.
This method will not be used in a live environment as it will be inserted as a plugin
